yacl3.config.magnetic.title: magnetic
yacl3.config.magnetic.category.general.r: The magnetic ability will only work if the tool in the off- or main-hand is enchanted with magnetic. If this option is set to false, the enchantment will not be available.
Requires the player to sneak to use magnetic.
Allows the player to also pickup exp with magnetic.
Allows the player to also pickup items with magnetic.
The specified entities will not be affected by magnetic when killed. You can use both tags and entity ids (resource locations) to define which entities to ignore.
Ignores drops that were produced by a player that was further away from the entity than this value. If this value is set to -1, no check will be performed.
yacl3.config.magnetic.category.general.g: Enables sound alerts that trigger when magnetic tries to add an item to the inventory, but the inventory is already full.
The time that has to pass to play the sound alert again.
Enables text message alerts that trigger when magnetic tries to add an item to the inventory, but the inventory is already full.
The time that has to pass to show the text message alert again.
Enables title alerts that trigger when magnetic tries to add an item to the inventory, but the inventory is already full.
The time that has to pass to show the title alert again.
When enabled, all of the items that are handled by magnetic will be pulled towards you instead of directly being put in your inventory.
Defines how fast the items should be pulled towards a player.
Toggles whether other players can intercept the floating items and pick them up.
